hero.title: The Crescent Beach Hotel
hero.subtitle: Where luxury meets the endless horizon
hero.description: Experience unparalleled luxury on the pristine shores of the Caspian Sea. Where timeless elegance meets modern comfort across nine magnificent buildings.

homepage.legacy_title: A Legacy of Luxury on the Caspian Shore
homepage.legacy_description: For decades, The Crescent Beach Hotel has stood as a beacon of excellence on Azerbaijan's most prestigious beachfront. With 262 luxurious rooms and extensive leisure facilities, we offer an unmatched blend of traditional Azerbaijani hospitality and modern sophistication.
homepage.legacy_note: From hosting international sports teams to corporate leaders, we've welcomed guests from over 50 countries, creating unforgettable experiences on the shores of the Caspian Sea.
homepage.amenities_description: Every detail has been carefully crafted to provide you with the ultimate luxury experience, from our private beach to our world-class spa and entertainment facilities.
homepage.rooms_description: Choose from our collection of elegantly designed rooms and suites, each offering stunning views and premium amenities for the perfect stay.
homepage.dining_description: Embark on a culinary journey at our distinctive restaurants, each offering unique atmospheres and exceptional cuisine crafted by world-renowned chefs.
homepage.why_choose_title: Why Choose The Crescent Beach Hotel
homepage.why_choose_description: Discover what makes us the premier choice for discerning travelers seeking the ultimate beachfront luxury experience.
homepage.testimonials_description: Read testimonials from our valued guests who have experienced the exceptional hospitality and luxury that defines The Crescent Beach Hotel.
homepage.partnerships_description: We proudly serve as the preferred destination for international sports teams, corporate events, and prestigious organizations from around the world.
homepage.final_cta_description: Experience the perfect blend of luxury, tradition, and modern comfort at Azerbaijan's premier beachfront destination. Your unforgettable stay awaits.

booking.widget_subtitle: Experience luxury at The Crescent Beach Hotel

features.pools_description: Multiple swimming pools including infinity pools with stunning Caspian Sea views and indoor pools for year-round enjoyment.
features.wellness_description: Complete wellness center with modern gym, steam and dry saunas, and rejuvenating spa treatments.
features.beach_description: Exclusive private beach with premium sunbeds and beachside service on the pristine Caspian Sea shore.
features.children_description: Dedicated children's area with safe play zones, entertainment programs, and family-friendly activities.
features.bar_description: Unique sail-structured bar offering refreshing beverages and light snacks with panoramic sea views.
features.entertainment_description: Professional entertainment venue hosting live performances, cultural shows, and special events.

why_choose.legacy_description: Decades of hospitality experience with a reputation for exceptional service and memorable experiences.
why_choose.service_description: 24/7 concierge service and personalized attention to ensure every guest feels special and cared for.
why_choose.safety_description: Comprehensive safety protocols and security measures ensuring peace of mind throughout your stay.
why_choose.amenities_description: Cutting-edge facilities and technology integrated seamlessly with traditional Azerbaijani hospitality.

partnerships.fifa_description: Official accommodation partner for international beach football tournaments and events.
partnerships.circuit_description: Premium hospitality services during Formula 1 and motorsport events in Baku.
partnerships.teams_description: Host to handball teams and sports delegations from across Europe and beyond.

offers.enterprise_description: Special corporate rates and comprehensive packages for business travelers and conference groups.
offers.membership_description: Exclusive seasonal membership with beach access, dining privileges, and special event invitations.
offers.loyalty_description: Earn points with every stay and enjoy exclusive benefits, room upgrades, and personalized services.

rooms.page_subtitle: 262 luxurious rooms, each designed for comfort and elegance
rooms.hero_description: Choose from our collection of beautifully appointed rooms and suites, each offering modern amenities and stunning views of the Caspian Sea.

standard_single.name: Standard Single Room
standard_single.description: Comfortable accommodation with queen bed and modern amenities

standard_twin.name: Standard Twin Room
standard_twin.description: Spacious room with two double beds, perfect for families or colleagues

deluxe_sea.name: Deluxe Room with Sea View
deluxe_sea.description: Premium accommodation with stunning Caspian Sea views and upgraded amenities

family_connected.name: Connected Family Rooms
family_connected.description: Two adjoining rooms with connecting door, ideal for families with children

executive_suite.name: Executive Suite
executive_suite.description: Luxurious suite with separate living area and premium business amenities

presidential_suite.name: Presidential Suite
presidential_suite.description: Ultimate luxury accommodation with panoramic views and exclusive services

corporate_building.name: Corporate Building Units
corporate_building.description: Entire building rental for corporate events and long-term stays

dining.page_subtitle: Experience world-class cuisine at our distinctive restaurants and bars
dining.hero_description: Experience world-class cuisine at our distinctive restaurants and bars, where international flavors meet the pristine shores of the Caspian Sea
dining.restaurants_description: Each venue offers a unique atmosphere and culinary experience, from elegant fine dining to casual beachside relaxation
dining.terrace_description: Experience international cuisine at its finest with our à la carte menu featuring dishes from around the world, complemented by stunning Caspian Sea views.
dining.wildwest_description: Step into the American frontier with our Western-themed restaurant offering authentic American cuisine in a rustic, nostalgic atmosphere.
dining.shadebar_description: Relax under our unique sail structure while enjoying refreshing beverages and light snacks with unobstructed views of the Caspian Sea.
dining.poolbar_description: Cool off poolside with tropical drinks and casual dining while enjoying the perfect view of our outdoor swimming pool and recreational areas.
dining.private_dining_description: Create unforgettable memories with our bespoke private dining experiences for intimate celebrations, corporate events, and wedding receptions.
dining.room_service_description: Enjoy our full dining menu from the comfort of your room, available around the clock for hotel guests.
dining.dietary_description: Our chefs are happy to accommodate special dietary requirements including vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options.
dining.chefs_table_description: Book an exclusive chef's table experience with personalized menu creation and behind-the-scenes kitchen access.

amenities.page_subtitle: Discover luxury amenities designed for your ultimate comfort and enjoyment
amenities.private_beach_description: Exclusive 500m private beach with premium services and water sports
amenities.pools_description: Multiple pools for every preference and season
amenities.wellness_description: Complete wellness facilities for body and mind
amenities.kids_club_description: Safe and fun environment for children
amenities.entertainment_description: Professional venue for events and performances

conferences.page_subtitle: State-of-the-art venues for successful corporate events and meetings
conferences.grand_hall_description: Main conference facility for up to 300 guests
conferences.breakout_rooms_description: Flexible spaces for smaller group sessions
conferences.saipem_description: Multi-week corporate training and executive retreats
conferences.bp_description: High-level executive meetings and strategic planning
conferences.baku_circuit_description: Employee events and corporate hospitality during F1
conferences.fifa_description: Tournament planning and international delegation hosting
conferences.handball_description: Team accommodation and sports delegation events
conferences.corporate_building_description: Entire buildings for extended corporate programs

gallery.page_subtitle: Discover the beauty and luxury of The Crescent Beach Hotel through our curated collection
gallery.hero_description: Discover the beauty and luxury of The Crescent Beach Hotel through our curated collection of photos and videos
gallery.adjust_search: Try adjusting your search terms or clearing the filters to see more results
gallery.press_media_description: High-resolution images available for press and media use. Contact our marketing team for access to our complete media library
gallery.virtual_tour_description: Experience our luxury hotel from the comfort of your home with our immersive 360° virtual tour
gallery.share_experience_description: Tag us in your posts and use our hashtags to be featured on our social media!
gallery.share_photos_tip: Share your photos and get featured on our Instagram stories!
gallery.guest_stories_description: See what our guests are sharing about their experiences at The Crescent Beach Hotel

contact.page_subtitle: Get in touch with The Crescent Beach Hotel for reservations and inquiries
contact.hero_description: We're here to help you plan your perfect stay and answer any questions you may have
contact.department_description: Connect directly with our specialized teams for faster, more personalized service
contact.reservations_description: Room bookings, availability, and reservation modifications
contact.events_description: Weddings, corporate events, meetings, and special occasions
contact.corporate_description: Group bookings, corporate accounts, and business partnerships
contact.concierge_description: Guest services, recommendations, and assistance during your stay
contact.emergency_description: For urgent matters or emergencies during your stay, our security team is available 24/7
contact.get_in_touch_description: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible
contact.subject: Subject
contact.newsletter_signup: I'd like to receive updates and special offers from The Crescent Beach Hotel
contact.message_sent_description: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you within 24 hours
contact.form_privacy: By submitting this form, you agree to our privacy policy. We'll never share your information with third parties

categories.general_description: For general questions about our hotel and services
categories.reservation_description: For room bookings and reservation inquiries
categories.event_description: For weddings, conferences, and special events
categories.complaint_description: For feedback or concerns about your experience

directions.shuttle_description: Complimentary airport shuttle service available with advance reservation (24 hours notice required)
directions.parking_description: Complimentary valet parking service for all hotel guests. Self-parking also available
directions.taxi_description: Our concierge can arrange reliable taxi services and provide estimated fares for popular destinations
directions.transport_description: Baku has an excellent metro system and bus network. Our staff can provide routes and schedules

footer.newsletter: Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive offers and updates
